message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I'm aiming for a more balanced arrangement this time, Alice. Let's make a deal!
Bob, time is money! This is a good deal before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Alice, this is it. A perfectly even split. It's the fairest offer and the only one that guarantees us both a decent share before inflation hurts my part even more.
